ai-atk-s0501a4:88_1: It’s when a mendicant has an adept’s right view, right thought, right speech, right action, right livelihood, right effort, right mindfulness, right immersion, right knowledge, and right freedom.
ai-atk-s0501a4:88_2: That’s how a mendicant is an adept.”
ai-atk-s0501a4:89_0: Thus should be understood in the way already described.
ai-atk-s0501a4:90_0: Except in the ultimate talk, lesserating,
